text: department of environmental services solid waste division rulemaking notice requirements amend rsa iii to read as follows administration of a permit system including the terms conditions and time frames under which the department shall issue modify suspend revoke deny approve or transfer permits required by this chapter and means of noticing the public about such permits including but not limited to using electronic means via notice on the department s internet website and communicating permitting information with affected municipalities department of environmental services solid waste division permit required electronic notice required amend rsa viii to read as follows the department shall act upon each permit application within the time periods specified in rules adopted under rsa for permits requiring a public hearing under rules adopted under rsa once the department determines that an application is complete in no case without prior written agreement regarding an extension with the applicant shall the department take longer than days to issue or deny the permit for permits that do not require a public hearing under rules adopted under rsa once the department determines that the application is complete in no case without the prior written agreement regarding an extension with the applicant shall the department take longer than days to issue or deny the permit prior to such action the department shall provide notice of the application by publication in at least one newspaper of general circulation in the community and on the department s internet website and an opportunity for hearing to interested persons the applicant shall notify abutters of the public hearing in writing by certified mail return receipt requested the requirement of public notice and hearing shall apply at the discretion of the department to facilities or activities that will have an insignificant effect on environmental quality as defined by rule under rsa
